exclusion.criterion: acute gastroenteritis within 3 days before admission
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: usage of probiotics and/or prebiotics within 7 days before admission
exclusion.label: not_met
not_met
exclusion.evidence: stool is watery and white but the patient has no fever

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: The skin turgor has reduced. HR is 110 and he looks ill with dry mucosa

notes: Patient has V. cholerae in stool specimen, but no fever.
